title: Hilarious moment girl, 3, tries her first ever ‘big ride’ at a theme park
text:

The hilarious moment a young girl's excitement turns to fear on her first big theme park ride was captured by her dad.

Footage taken by Nate Houle zooms in on the face of his three-year-old daughter.

As the pirate ship ride they're both on in Farmington, Utah gently undulates father and offspring look happy.

A large smile is spread across the young lady's face as her light blonde hair flutters in the wind.

On the first rock up to the top she gurgles in delight as the boat crests only a couple of metres from its resting point.

(Image: Viralhog)

(Image: Viralhog)

Suddenly all manner of emotions break loose.

The video jumps forward to the ride when it is in full sail, the ship whooshing through the air as it swings up and down.

The look on Nate's daughter's face has turned from one of outright pleasure to one of deep terror.

(Image: Viralhog)

(Image: Viralhog)

Her small brown eyes become pools of fear - the collective agony of hundreds of toddlers who had ridden before her painted across her face.

And then suddenly the mood lifts.

The young girl's pain turns to bliss as the boat continues to rock.

(Image: Viralhog)

(Image: Viralhog)

She lets out a wild scream of joy followed by an enormous smile.

As the ride comes to a halt Nate asks: "Was it awesome? Huh? Was it so awesome?"

All his daughter can muster is a gurgled: "Yeah".
description: Nate Houle decide to take his daughter on a wild pirate ship ride in Farmington, Utah
